foreignBusinessType.description: Which of the following are **true** about your business? **Select all that apply.**

optionContent.operationsInNJ: Part of my `business operations|nexus-business` takes place in New Jersey
optionContent.employeesInNJ: I have employees who live in New Jersey
optionContent.transactionsInNJ: I have more than 200 separate taxable transactions in New Jersey in the current or prior calendar year
optionContent.revenueInNJ: My taxable transactions in New Jersey exceeded $100,000 in the last calendar year

foreignBusinessType.REMOTE_WORKER: It sounds like you have `Remote Workers|remote-worker` .
foreignBusinessType.REMOTE_SELLER: It sounds like you're a `Remote Seller|remote-seller` .

locationInNewJersey.header: ## Will you own or lease space in New Jersey?
locationInNewJersey.errorTextRequired: Please select whether you will have a New Jersey location
locationInNewJersey.radioButtonYesText: Yes, I will own or lease space in New Jersey
locationInNewJersey.radioButtonNoText: No, I will not own or lease space in New Jersey
